Just letting everyone know who has been interested, that one possibly two teams will be coming to my house to investigate. If you ahve read my blogs on myspace <link below> you will have some knowledge of what has been going on here.
  Mark, writer of SEARCHING THE ABYSS, gave the refferal to me. 
  Thanks for those who have been interested and have given me advice!
   
  Amy
